## Description The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. ## K 4 POWER CONTROL FLEX HOME Der K 4 Power Control Flex mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch und G 160 Q Power Control-Pistole ist für mittelstarke Verschmutzungen auf Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln und Autos geeignet. Inkl. Home Kit. ## Bestell-Nr. 1.324-303.0 - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff - Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529126931
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 130 / 2 - max. 13
Fördermenge l/h max. 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.8
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 11.9
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 17.2
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 405 × 306 × 584
## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Home Kit Flächenreiniger T 5, Stein- und Fassadenreiniger, 3in1, 1 l
Hochdruckpistole G 160 Q Power Control
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz [x]
HD-Schlauch 8 m / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmitteleinsatz über Plug 'n' Clean-System
Teleskopgriff [x]
Wassergekühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]

It features a hose reel on the back and a prominent power switch on the front. ### Components Included: - **Pressure Washer Unit**: The main device, colored in yellow with black accents, designed for high-pressure cleaning tasks. - **Surface Cleaner Attachment**: A circular, yellow and black attachment for cleaning flat surfaces. - **Spray Wand**: Two different spray wands are included, each with distinct nozzles for various cleaning applications. - **Detergent Bottle**: A bottle of cleaning solution, labeled for use with the pressure washer. ### Certifications and Features: - **Guinness World Record Holder**: The product is noted for holding a record, though the specific record is not detailed in the image. - **World's No. 1 Pressure Washer Brand**: The product is claimed to be from the leading brand in pressure washers globally. - **Made in Europe**: The product is manufactured in Europe, as indicated by the European Union flag. - **Eco-Friendly**: An icon suggests the product is environmentally friendly. - **100% Power**: An icon indicates the product delivers full power performance. The image effectively showcases the pressure washer and its accessories, highlighting its features and certifications. ## Figure Description The image is a cropped section of a document labeled as a "figure." ## Description

The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.

## K 4 POWER CONTROL FLEX HOME

Der K 4 Power Control Flex mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch und G 160 Q Power Control-Pistole ist für mittelstarke Verschmutzungen auf Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln und Autos geeignet. Inkl. Home Kit.

## Bestell-Nr.

1.324-303.0

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff
- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529126931
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 130 / 2 - max. 13
Fördermenge l/h max. 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.8
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 11.9
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 17.2
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 405 × 306 × 584

## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Home Kit Flächenreiniger T 5, Stein- und Fassadenreiniger, 3in1, 1 l
Hochdruckpistole G 160 Q Power Control
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz [x]

## Description

The image displays a yellow and black pressure washer set, which includes several components and accessories. The main unit is a compact, upright pressure washer with a handle and wheels for easy mobility. It features a hose reel on the back and a prominent power switch on the front.

### Components Included:

- **Pressure Washer Unit**: The main device, colored in yellow with black accents, designed for high-pressure cleaning tasks.
- **Surface Cleaner Attachment**: A circular, yellow and black attachment for cleaning flat surfaces.
- **Spray Wand**: Two different spray wands are included, each with distinct nozzles for various cleaning applications.
- **Detergent Bottle**: A bottle of cleaning solution, labeled for use with the pressure washer.

### Certifications and Features:

- **Guinness World Record Holder**: The product is noted for holding a record, though the specific record is not detailed in the image.
- **World's No. 1 Pressure Washer Brand**: The product is claimed to be from the leading brand in pressure washers globally.
- **Made in Europe**: The product is manufactured in Europe, as indicated by the European Union flag.
- **Eco-Friendly**: An icon suggests the product is environmentally friendly.
- **100% Power**: An icon indicates the product delivers full power performance.

The image effectively showcases the pressure washer and its accessories, highlighting its features and certifications.

## Figure Description

The image is a cropped section of a document labeled as a "figure." It contains a graph with the following details:

- **Title**: The title of the graph is not visible in the crop.
- **Axes**:
  - **X-Axis**: Labeled with categories or time intervals, though specific labels are not visible.
  - **Y-Axis**: Represents numerical values, but specific labels or units are not visible.
- **Data Representation**: The graph likely uses bars or lines to represent data points, but the specific type is unclear from the crop.
- **Legend**: There is no visible legend in the crop.
- **Annotations**: No annotations are visible.

### Observations

- The graph appears to show a trend or comparison, but specific data points or trends are not discernible from the crop.
- The overall context or subject of the graph is not clear due to the limited view.
